subject: p12702423
Findings: There has been interval decrease in size of the left pleural effusion, which is now moderate in severity. Small right pleural effusion is present. Bilateral consolidations, more dense on the left, persist. No pneumothorax is seen. Extensive nodularity is consistent with known metastatic disease.
Impression: Interval decrease in size of left pleural effusion, which is still moderate in severity.
